alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 11 at 11:53AM AKST until February 11 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 13 inches * WHERE...The Northeast Gulf Coast including Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Heavy, wet snow will be difficult to manage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 11 am reports of around 8 inches in Yakutat have been received so far with moderate snow continuing to fall. A transition to rain is expected toward Friday evening with up to an inch of rain expected in the 12 hours following the changeover.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area
